text: ebævin kavurun ho tamange bharyayavanva (tama) mavata sama kara pævasu pasu, ema kiyamanen apasu (nævatat ekkasu vimata kæmati vuvahot) e dedenama kenekuta keneku sparsa kirimata perama (mese sama kara kata kirime varadata vandi vasayen) ek vahaleku nidahas kara hæriya yutuya (yayi) memagin obata desana karanu labannehuya. allah oba karana dæya hondin danneku vasayen sitinneya
